azurerm_spring_cloud_app.description: Manage an Azure Spring Cloud Application.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Spring Cloud Application. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the resource group in which to create the Spring Cloud Application. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

service_name.description: Specifies the name of the Spring Cloud Service resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the Spring Cloud Application.

create.description: Used when creating the Spring Cloud Application.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Spring Cloud Application.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Spring Cloud Application.
